abstract: Jefferson County in Alabama sued JPMorgan Chase on Friday, seeking additional relief on $3.2 billion in county sewer bonds the bank helped underwrite.
snippet: Jefferson County in Alabama sued JPMorgan Chase on Friday, seeking additional relief on $3.2 billion in county sewer bonds the bank helped underwrite.
lead_paragraph: Even after a $700 million settlement with the federal government, JPMorgan Chase still faces troubles in Alabama, The New York Times’s Mary Williams Walsh reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan Faces New Suit in Alabama County’s Woes
